My Style Guide

Default Styles

Name: Headings

Description

Description of the <h1> to <h6> tags.

Example

Heading

Heading

Heading

Heading

Heading
Heading

Code

          <h1>Heading</h1>

Name: Anchors

Description

Description of the <a> tags.

Example

This is a link

Code

          <a href="#">This is a link.</a>

Helper Classes

Name: Card

Description

This is the description of the .card class

Example

Literally direct trade 8-bit, poutine health goth tumblr offal leggings. YOLO quinoa fanny pack, fashion axe squid yuccie iPhone vegan street art tumblr. Tattooed tumblr pop-up viral literally.

Code

          <div class="card">
  <p>
    Literally direct trade 8-bit, poutine health goth tumblr offal leggings. YOLO quinoa fanny pack, fashion axe squid yuccie iPhone vegan street art tumblr. Tattooed tumblr pop-up viral literally.
  </p>
</div>

Name: Full Width

Description

This is the description of the .full-width class

Example

Code

          <div class="full-width">
  <p>
    Literally direct trade 8-bit, poutine health goth tumblr offal leggings. YOLO quinoa fanny pack, fashion axe squid yuccie iPhone vegan street art tumblr. Tattooed tumblr pop-up viral literally.
  </p>
</div>
